Articles.Content:
Version: x64 1.12

Mods: Strategia, Probes Before Crew, Contract Configurator, Waterfall, Near Future Suite, Far Future, Benjee10's mods,  Bluedog Design Bureau, TAC life support, Trajectories, Sigma Dimensions, Sigma Binary, Outer Planets mod, K&K Planetary Base Systems.

As previously stated, KSP crashes after hideUI. This happens consistently when entering new buildings. The timing of these events is not consistent, however. It crashes during missions too. KSP.log attached.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YBvYfwdBEyA33MDAZeNP8aJ7puXRFKjj/view?usp=sharing

 

Edited May 31, 2022 by eagleswing12
unclear first
Update: KSP dies with an extreme XMP profile. 3200mhz to 3333mhz was not productive for KSP remaining alive.

12 minutes ago, eagleswing12 said:

Update: KSP dies with an extreme XMP profile. 3200mhz to 3333mhz was not productive for KSP remaining alive.

XMP is overclocking, try not using that.

Also possible you have some bad memory

Edited June 1, 2022 by linuxgurugamer
